title: Honor 5 ward
body: I was honor 5 but then when I opened League it said that I won the honor 5 ward but it wasn't in my loot and it just completely disappeared from my inventory and I can't use it.

replies.body: Those honor wards were automatically redeemed and didn't ever go into your loot. If you enter into a practice/custom game you should be able to find the ward in your collection there!
Did you check your inventory of wards in Champ Select? Your Honor 5 ward should be there.

> [{quoted}](name=SteveTheMiner,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=pohYV5A1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-20T22:22:43.652+0000)
>
> Did you check your inventory of wards in Champ Select? Your Honor 5 ward should be there.

I didn't check but I will, thx for the help <3
